articles.content:
Congratulations and gifts to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with congratulatory letters and gifts by family members of Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle on the occasion of his birthday (February 16).
 Congratulatory letters and gifts came from the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, and the family of Feng Yila, daughter of Feng Zhongyun, and a gift from by Liu Shaohua, daughter of Liu Hanxing.
 The letters and gifts were conveyed to DPRK Ambassador to China Choe Jin Su by Zhou Wei, Feng Yila and Liu Shaohua on Jan. 27.

articles.title: Young People Urged to Become Shock Force in Building Prosperous Country
Formation of South-North Joint Measure Committee Urged
articles.content:
Young People Urged to Become Shock Force in Building Prosperous Country 
    Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The 30th Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was held here on Tuesday, at which tasks facing the youth league organizations to carry through the militant tasks laid down in the joint editorial for this year were discussed.
 Brought forward at the meeting were tasks and ways for the youth league officials and members to firmly defend the idea of the Party and the leader on the youth movement and their feats in leading it and stand in the van of the general onward march of the Songun revolution as the death-defying corps safeguarding the leader and the shock force in building a prosperous and powerful nation, true to the joint editorial which is a militant banner of the onward march.    
 At present the young people are faced with the honorable task to become revolutionary comrades sharing destiny with leader Kim Jong Il and play a role of the vanguard and shock force in the drive to carry through his intention devotedly, it said, urging the youth league organizations to push ahead with this work vigorously.

articles.content:
Formation of South-North Joint Measure Committee Urged 
    Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting on the current situation of public figures was reportedly held in Seoul on January 28 to inaugurate a south organization for the promotion of the South-North Joint Measure Committee for the Withdrawal of the U.S. Forces.
 It was recalled at the meeting that major organizations in the north had proposed a general turnout in the fight against the U.S. and, as a practical step, formation of a south-north joint measure committee for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces.    
 Noting that the conversion of the movement for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces into one involving the general spheres, the whole region and the masses is an urgent impending task in the movement for national independence, the meeting stressed the need to form the south-north joint measure committee at an early date and build up the main motive power of struggle to this end. An appeal adopted at the meeting called for
inaugurating the joint measure committee in a short time and draw the whole nation into the anti-U.S. movement for national reunification so as to terminate the U.S. domination and military occupation and open wide a new era of independent reunification.    
 The pullout of the U.S. forces is not the demand of a specified organization and a specified class but the fighting task of the whole nation, the appeal said, proposing to hold a meeting on the situation bringing together all the anti-American patriotic figures of different circles in February with a view to making 2005 the year of the withdrawal of
the U.S. forces.

Syrian Preparatory Committee Formed
    Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A Syrian preparatory committee was inaugurated in Damascus on Jan. 27 to celebrate the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il (February 16).
 Wolid Hamdoun, member of the Regional Leadership of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party who is chairman of the Syrian Arab-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee and Abdullah Abu Rish, chairman of the Control Committee of the party, its vice-chairman.    
 The preparatory committee decided to organize a seminar, a friendly gathering and other colorful events on the occasion of the February holiday.

Plan for Tactical Exercise of S. Korean Army in Bitter Cold Announced
    Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The "Metropolitan Garrison Command" of the south Korean army announced that its units'  tactical exercise in the depth of winter would be launched near Mt. Kwanak in Seoul on Jan. 31 under the simulated conditions of repelling the infiltration of some forces, according to KBS of south Korea.
  The drill which will last till Feb. 4 will reportedly involve the firing of blank shells, helicopter mobile and search exercises, ambush, etc.
